mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new map of Georgia: with its roads & distances
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868
Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co. No. 253 Market Street
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Plate no. "20." printed in upper right margin.
Appeared as plate 20 in S.A. Mitchell's "A new universal atlas...," Philadelphia: Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co., 1851.
"Entered accrding to act of Congress, in the year 1850, by Thomas, Cowperthwait & Co., in the clerk's office of the District court of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania."
Includes tables of steamboat routes from Savannah to Augusta and from Ssvannah to Charleston.
Explanation: Canals, Rail Roads, State Capital, County towns, Common towns, Leading roads.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads--Georgia--Maps.
Roads--Georgia--Maps.
Georgia--Maps.
